title: EXCLUSIVE: Hannah Ann Interview, Part 1
description:
After the shocking finale, Hannah Ann is talking only to Bachelor Happy Hour. Rachel and Becca talk to Hannah Ann about her engagement and subsequent breakup with Peter. When did things start to unravel? What did Hannah Ann think about Barb’s reaction to Madison tonight? 

Plus, Becca and Rachel share their thoughts on the shocking finale.

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode. 

Thanks to our sponsors:
